verses.name: Deuteronomy 1:38
verses.text: But Joshua the son of Nun, which standeth before thee, he shall go in thither: encourage him: for he shall cause Israel to inherit it.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 1:39
verses.text: Moreover your little ones, which ye said should be a prey, and your children, which in that day had no knowledge between good and evil, they shall go in thither, and unto them will I give it, and they shall possess it.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 1:40
verses.text: But as for you, turn you, and take your journey into the wilderness by the way of the Red sea.
